name: HKObjectType
desc: An abstract superclass with subclasses that identify a specific type of data for the HealthKit store.

items.name: class func quantityType(forIdentifier: HKQuantityTypeIdentifier) -> HKQuantityType?
items.desc: Returns the shared quantity type for the provided identifier.

items.name: struct HKQuantityTypeIdentifier
items.desc: The identifiers that create quantity type objects.

items.name: class func categoryType(forIdentifier: HKCategoryTypeIdentifier) -> HKCategoryType?
items.desc: Returns the shared category type for the provided identifier.

items.name: class func characteristicType(forIdentifier: HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier) -> HKCharacteristicType?
items.desc: Returns the shared characteristic type for the provided identifier.

items.name: struct HKCharacteristicTypeIdentifier
items.desc: The identifiers that create characteristic type objects.

items.name: class func correlationType(forIdentifier: HKCorrelationTypeIdentifier) -> HKCorrelationType?
items.desc: Returns the shared correlation type for the provided identifier.

items.name: struct HKCorrelationTypeIdentifier
items.desc: The identifiers that create correlation type objects.

items.name: class func activitySummaryType() -> HKActivitySummaryType
items.desc: Returns the shared activity summary type.

items.name: class func clinicalType(forIdentifier: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier) -> HKClinicalType?
items.desc: Returns the shared clinical type for the provided identifier.

items.name: class func seriesType(forIdentifier: String) -> HKSeriesType?
items.desc: Returns the shared series type for the provided identifier.

items.name: class func documentType(forIdentifier: HKDocumentTypeIdentifier) -> HKDocumentType?
items.desc: Returns the shared document type for the provided identifier.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A unique string identifying the HealthKit object type.
